title: Running with dogs in the snow
creator: ksi
visual_description: A person in a red jacket is running in a snowy field with two dogs following closely behind. There is a large mountain range in the background.

sociolinguistic_analysis.gesture_analysis: The runner frequently looks back at the dogs, indicating a playful chase.
sociolinguistic_analysis.content_analysis: Video designed to showcase the joy of outdoor activities with pets.
